actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to allow articles withdrawn from a bonded manufacturing warehouse to be delivered into successive bonded storage warehouses located anywhere in the United States for the purpose of exportation, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Allows articles withdrawn from a bonded manufacturing warehouse to be delivered into successive bonded warehouses anywhere in the United States for exportation purposes (currently, limited to deliveries to bonded warehouses at an exterior port for immediate export).

titles.title: A bill to allow articles withdrawn from a bonded manufacturing warehouse to be delivered into successive bonded storage warehouses located anywhere in the United States for the purpose of exportation, and for other purposes.
